extendedInfo.description: Prepare your theory test for motorcycle with latest and official DSA revision question bank which has over 900 questions.PREPARE BY TOPICS:You can study the highway code by topic. All questions are sorted by topic. It also tells you the areas that each topic covers.â Accidentsâ Alertnessâ Attitudeâ Documentsâ Hazard Awarenessâ Motorway Rulesâ Other Types of Vehicleâ Road and Traffic Signsâ Rules of the Roadâ Safety Marginsâ Safety and Your Motorcycleâ Motorcycle Handlingâ Motorcycle Loadingâ Vulnerable Road UsersMOCK TEST MODE:Mock test simulates the real test format. Questions are presented randomly from all the topics.DETAILED TEST RESULTS:A summary of the practice test is presented at the end of each test. It shows you the score, which questions you answered correctly and where you were wrong. PROGRESS METER:The app records your progress as you start giving practice tests.It shows you a beautiful bar chart so that you can track your weak areas and give more focus on them.FEATURE LIST:â¢ Over 900 multiple-choice questions.â¢ Choose number of questions you would like in each test.â¢ A new module, âProgress Meterâ keeps track of how you are performing in a particular topic.â¢ Mock test has exactly similar format as in real test.Copyright Info:â¢ Crown copyright material reproduced under licence from the Driving Standards Agency and the controller of HMSO which does not accept any responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.â¢ The questions are valid for theory tests taken after May 2013Theory test for motorbikesKeywords :- DSA, Hazard, Motorcycle, Signs, Traffic, alertness, bank, code, documents, highway, learners, license, motorcycle, question, road, rules, safety, test, traffic, uk

reviews.title: Great app but has some bugs
reviews.comment: Very intuitive and useful exercises. Tries to download 80 MB of data every time I open it though which is annoying.
reviews.author: Kevin Hogan

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app, but does have a bug in the mock test...when I answer questions about stopping distances and blue flashing lights, I answer correctly, but it marks wrong. When I check the answer, it has changed it such as I will answer \'animal ambulance\' and when I check it tells me I selected mountain rescue, and similar on stopping distances. But in all a great app!
reviews.author: Jay Bull

reviews.title: Great app!!!
reviews.comment: Passed with flying colours would have not been able to do it without this app. Kudos to the creators.
reviews.author: Nelson Socorro

reviews.title: Pass! !!
reviews.comment: Just couple hkurs ago I pass thanks to this app  Never had any problems :) Thanks again
reviews.author: Daniel Tuchowski

reviews.title: Passed! :)
reviews.comment: Thanks to this app I passed. Although it wasn\'t a clear pass that was down to me not the app. The application is brilliant. I\'ve not had the problem of not seeing full answers like some people seem to have. Everything worked great. I\'d say this app could do with an update because there were a few questions I weren\'t expecting and a different layout for the last few questions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just a must.
reviews.comment: Prepare for the bike theory on your phone. Cheaper,  more effective and simpler than books or CD ROM.
reviews.author: Tony L

reviews.title: Passed
reviews.comment: Great app. Works fine on my HTC Desire HD. As good as another paid for app. Recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just passed!
reviews.comment: Practice made perfect, altho the complaint about not being able to see the correct answer for picture questions still stands
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Passed my theory
reviews.comment: This is a very good theoretical app. Not as good looking as other similar apps and has some bugs in it buy hey, it made me pass my test on my first try.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Passed :)
reviews.comment: Just passed, needs updating though as there are a few questions at the end that I knew nothing about.. 45 out of 50 :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow - spot on app
reviews.comment: Used this for 2 weeks n just passed my theory. Perfect app for the multiple choice part. I got 50 out of 50 n completed it in 10 mins. \302\2432 well well spent!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sadly needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: I like the app in general but it has some major flaws / annoyances: 1. The answer text does not wrap and is being truncated, so often you can\'t see enough of the answer to get the question right. 2. The summary of how well you did for road signs does not indication if you got the right answer or what the right answer was. 3. Other apps of the same type give you immediate feedback of if you got the question right or wrong.  In this app if you choose to answer 20 questions you only know if you got them right after question 20.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Well spend two pound, help a lot in my theory test... but still you need to put lots hard work on it...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Helpfull
reviews.comment: Really good, loads of questions! Just that you can\'t see full answers on some :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing-HTC sensation
reviews.comment: There is no way of knowing what the correct answers to the sign questions are
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great App! It has a clear design, it Can track down ur test in order to let you know your progress. Its just awesome. Perfect app for practice ur theory.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is excellent! Passed first time using JUST this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Clarjey
reviews.comment: Found it really helpful and a freat revision tool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mr x
reviews.comment: Worth the money definite bargain
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Helped me pass with flying colours
reviews.author: Piers Ford
